slides.title: Welcome to FinTrack!
slides.content: A modern solution that simplifies your financial management.

slides.title: Track Your Income and Expenses Easily!
slides.content: You can track your daily expenses and income.

slides.title: Plan and Control Your Budget!
slides.content: You can keep your spending under control by setting a monthly limit.

slides.title: Save Money and Achieve Your Goals!
slides.content: How much should you set aside to save 10,000 TL per month?

slides.title: Visualize Your Financial Analysis!
slides.content: You can view graphs of data such as income-expenditure balance, spending habits.

slides.title: Add targets for your economy.
slides.content: Targets for economic developments can be added.

slides.title: Ready to Discover FinTrack?
slides.content: If you want more information about the app, you can use the Help/Support tab.
